VEC.Q: How many chords are in this chord chart?

SRP.Q: In the chord chart, what is the next arc in the clockwise direction from arc Parker University?
SRP.A: The next arc clockwise from arc Parker University is arc {Williams University}.

SRP.Q: In the chord chart, what is the next arc in the counterclockwise direction from arc Williams University?
SRP.A: The next arc counterclockwise from arc Williams University is arc {Parker University}.

VPR.Q: Which arc has the largest output flow in this chord chart?
VPR.A: {Williams University} has the largest output flow.

VPR.Q: Which arc has the largest input flow in this chord chart?
VPR.A: {Adriantown College} has the largest input flow.

EVJ.A: The maximum flow value between Williams University and Royal Academy is {51}.

SC.Q: What is the total flow output from Adriantown College?
SC.A: The total flow output from Adriantown College is {78}.

SC.Q: What is the total flow input by Parker University?
SC.A: The total flow input by Parker University is {78}.

NF.Q: Which pairs of nodes in the chord chart have a flow greater than 55? Please list the source node, target node, and the corresponding flow value.
NF.A: There is a flow of {66} from {Williams University} to {Adriantown College}, a flow of {59} from {Adriantown College} to {Williams University}.

NF.Q: Which pairs of nodes in the chord chart have a flow less than 20? Please list the source node, target node, and the corresponding flow value.
NF.A: There is a flow of {19} from {Adriantown College} to {Royal Academy}.

NF.Q: Which pairs of nodes in the chord chart have a flow between 31 and 45? Please list the source node, target node, and the corresponding flow value.
NF.A: There is a flow of {44} from {Royal Academy} to {Parker University}, a flow of {37} from {Parker University} to {Royal Academy}, a flow of {34} from {Williams University} to {Parker University}.

NC.Q: Which flow is larger: from Williams University to Parker University or from Adriantown College to Williams University?
NC.A: The flow from {Adriantown College} to {Williams University} is larger.

NC.Q: Which flow is the largest: from Parker University to Royal Academy, from Adriantown College to Williams University, or from Royal Academy to Adriantown College?
NC.A: The flow from {Adriantown College} to {Williams University} is the largest.

MSR.Q: Which category has the highest proportion of outgoing flow relative to its total flow?
MSR.A: The category with the highest proportion of outgoing flow relative to its total flow is {Royal Academy}.

MSR.Q: Which pair has the strongest chord connection in this chord chart?
MSR.A: The strongest chord connection is between {Adriantown College} and {Williams University}.

VA.Q: To minimize the crossings between chords, please reorder the outer arcs and list the reorder arc order in clockwise direction.
VA.A: The reordered arc order in clockwise direction is: {Arc Parker University, Arc Royal Academy, Arc Williams University, Arc Adriantown College}.
